physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Physical examination at 11 years old showed short stature (weight of 17.0 kg, height of 124.4 cm), significant failure to thrive, and generalized hard nodules involving the trunk and extremities. Limited mobility due to extensive joint contractures of bilateral upper and lower extremities, significantly affecting the elbows and knees. Muscle strength was 2/5 bilaterally throughout. No malformation of the great toes.
